methods.loadNative: Ensure that libraries have been loaded, before using sendSignalNative(...).
methods.sendSignalNative:
Use native code to send a signal by number.

:param processId: (int) - The process ID to send the signal to
:param signalNumber: (int) - The signal number to send
:return: (int) The return value of kill(2).
methods.sendSignalWithBinKill:
Use /bin/kill to send a signal by name.

:param processId: (int) - The process ID to send the signal to
:param signalName: (java.lang.String) - The name of the signal to send
:return: (int) The exit value of the child process.
